price: But those who strive against Our verses[21], seeking to discredit them, it is they who will be summoned to the punishment.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡعَوۡنَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ
footnotes: [21] In order to undermine their credibility.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
